com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit

Class UserExitEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamirror.ts.target.publication.userexit.UserExitEnvironment

  • public class UserExitEnvironment
extends java.lang.Object
    Every Java user exit application has a single instance of class UserExitEnvironment that allows the application to interface with the CDC environment in which the application is running. The current runtime can be obtained from the getEnvironment method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void closeDatabaseConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
      Closes a database connection.
      static UserExitEnvironment getEnvironment()
      Returns the UserExitEnvironment object.
      java.sql.Connection getNewDatabaseConnection()
      Returns a new database connection based on the current CDC instance configuration information.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • getEnvironment

        public static UserExitEnvironment getEnvironment()
        Returns the UserExitEnvironment object.
        Returns:
        UserExitEnvironment object

      • getNewDatabaseConnection

        public java.sql.Connection getNewDatabaseConnection()
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns a new database connection based on the current CDC instance configuration information. Each connection returned by the getNewDatabaseConnection() is a new connection to the database.
        Returns:
        a database connection to the current database
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - an exception encountered while attempting to connect to the database

      • closeDatabaseConnection

        public void closeDatabaseConnection(java.sql.Connection connection)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Closes a database connection. Will return without error if null is passed in.
        Parameters:
        connection - a connection to be closed.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - an exception thrown by the database server while attempting to close the connection.
